quotes.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: So many books, so little time.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Bernard M. Baruch

quotes.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: I think being in love with life is a key to eternal youth.
quotes.author: oug Hutchison

quotes.quote: You’re only here for a short visit. Don’t hurry, don’t worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
quotes.author: Walter Hagen

quotes.quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: All of life is peaks and valleys. Don’t let the peaks get too high and the valleys too low.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Find ecstasy in life; the mere sense of living is joy enough.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it’s all that matters.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: I enjoy life when things are happening. I don’t care if it’s good things or bad things. That means you’re alive.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
quotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

quotes.quote: Life doesn’t require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: I always like to look on the optimistic side of life, but I am realistic enough to know that life is a complex matter.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The truth is you don’t know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.
quotes.author: Eminem
